## Texture.samplingMode property

Enables crisper images based on the provided sampling mode. \| Value \| Type \| \|\-\-\-\-\-\--\|\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\-\---\| \| 1 \| NEAREST \| \| 2 \| BILINEAR \| \| 3 \| TRILINEAR \|

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
readonly samplingMode: number;
```
